answers.answer: I would call because of the combination of swelling and headaches. Especially if you have a puffy face and hands, it could be preeclampsia. If you feel something isn't right call, thts what they're there for! I developed preeclampsia at 37 weeks with no signs of high blood pressure until then. You know your body better than anyone else, good luck! :)

It's normal cause you're getting closer to labor I'm a bit swollen too and didn't start till my 35th week. I wouldn't worry as long as u don't have a high blood pressure problem. Just elevate your feet. Mine hurt so bad just from stepping on the floor :/good luck

yup i hav a decent amount of swelling on my face too... but yesterday i checkd my bp it was 130/90 and i guess its normal..the swelling is constant and not going away...feet swelling is to the point wer its going to hide my toes

hana,  you should probably call.   Preeclampsia can come up so fast - better to let them know.  Your swelling sounds significant.130/90 is kind of beginning to creep up there - it's not like 110/60 where you could just say you are fine with blood pressure.

Id call asap. If your swelling that bad and its not going down then call. Also the headache that is combined with the swelling is something to be cautious about. I agree it sounds like preeclampsia but Ur doctor knows best.

question: so since 3 days i m having crazy feet swelling and head aches.. wat is this.. the swelling is to the extent wer i cant walk anymore.. i m 38+2 weeks.. i hav my dr's appt tomorrow.. shud i wait till tomorrow?I dnt hav any gd or bp prblm.... any info on dis highly appreciable
title: Crazy feet swelling???
